Most current version is: 1.1.0
See the [http://code.google.com/p/acris/downloads/list download] section for all downloads.

Page describes how to migrate between next released versions. Currently there are following possibilites:
 * Migrate from version 1.0.0 to version 1.0.1 - follow details [Migration1_0_1 here]
 * Migrate from version 1.0.1 to version 1.1.0 - follow details [Migration1_1_0 here]
 * Migrate from version 1.1.0 to version 1.1.1-SNAPSHOT - follow details [Migration1_1_1 here]
